display_long_description:
Step into Animal Keeper, a groundbreaking VR experience that challenges you to capture a wide range of animal species in an immersive and beautifully rendered world. Explore diverse biomes, from the rustic charm of farms and the sweeping openness of plains to the mystery of deserts, the lush vibrance of jungles, and the frozen beauty of glaciers, each teeming with life and the promise of discovery. Every animal you encounter contributes to your quest for creating an unrivaled animal collection, which is the backbone of your revitalized zoo.

Armed with an array of tools including a delicate butterfly net, a robust hunting net, a tranquilizer gun, and a precisely baited cage, you employ skill and strategy to complete every capture. Experience the thrill of hunting as you track elusive creatures across varied terrains, with each pursuit testing your agility and wit. With a metal detector and shovel in hand, unearth valuable repair treasures to rebuild and upgrade your zoo enclosures, ensuring that your growing animal collection has a safe and engaging habitat.

Animal Keeper is a passionate tribute to animal life, zoo management, and the exhilarating art of hunting. Every successful capture and detailed restoration invites you deeper into a dynamic ecosystem of exploration and tactical planning. Enjoy the adventure as you build the ultimate zoo and celebrate the beauty of each animal encounter.

Want to give me a feedback? Report a bug? Discord : https://discord.gg/YX6WaTnmj4
